Package com.chillycheesy.modulo.events

Class EventManager

java.lang.Object
com.chillycheesy.modulo.utils.Manager<Listener>
com.chillycheesy.modulo.listener.ListenerManager
com.chillycheesy.modulo.events.EventManager
public class EventManager extends ListenerManager
EventManager make the gesture between Listener and Event. The EventManager instance is accessible from the EventContainer.
